mapper.insert: insert into board (bo_idx, bo_me_email, bo_bbsid, bo_me_nick, bo_title, bo_content, bo_regip, bo_regdate) values(BO_IDX_SEQ.nextval, #{bo_me_email}, #{bo_bbsid}, #{bo_me_nick}, #{bo_title}, #{bo_content}, #{bo_regip}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rnum,bo_idx,bo_me_email,bo_bbsid,bo_me_nick, bo_title,bo_content,bo_hit, bo_regdate,bo_regip,bo_status, bo_deldate from (select * from board where bo_bbsid = #{bo_bbsid} and bo_status = 0 order by bo_idx desc, bo_regdate desc)) where rnum >= #{pageStart} and rnum <= (#{page} * #{perPageNum})
select count(bo_idx) from board where bo_bbsid = #{bo_bbsid} and bo_status = 0

select * from (select rownum rnum,bo_idx,bo_me_email,bo_bbsid,bo_me_nick, bo_title,bo_content,bo_hit, bo_regdate,bo_regip,bo_status, bo_deldate from (select * from board where bo_bbsid = #{bo_bbsid} and bo_status = 0
order by bo_idx desc, bo_regdate desc)) where rnum >= #{pageStart} and rnum <= (#{page} * #{perPageNum})
select count(*) from board where bo_bbsid = #{bo_bbsid} and bo_status = 0
update board set bo_hit = bo_hit + 1 where bo_idx = #{bo_idx}
update board set bo_status = 1, bo_deldate = sysdate where bo_idx = #{bo_idx}
